posts.post_content:
Have a Cobb Bat on Shoulder - raw (authenticated by CSG) for sale or trade. Would ideally like to snag a tough cub off back or another hof off back with similar value. 

Putting value at $2300 for both sale and trade. For pics and offers please text me 219-218-8414 or email me [url]kaufmannb14@gmail.com[/url] 

Thanks.
